statements: SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal
SELECT location, disposal_method FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT id, location FROM Waste_Disposal ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE recycling_initiative = TRUE
SELECT id, location, disposal_method FROM Waste_Disposal ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, disposal_method FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_method FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE recycling_initiative = TRUE ORDER BY disposal_method DESC;
SELECT id, location, waste_type FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND waste_type IN ('Glass', 'Metal');
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal WHERE disposal_method IN ('Landfill', 'Incineration') AND location NOT LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal;
SELECT type, location, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, type, pickup_schedule FROM waste_disposal WHERE pickup_schedule = 'Weekly';
SELECT * FROM recycling_initiatives WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT id, recycling_method, contact_person FROM recycling_initiatives ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT type, location, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal WHERE location='City A';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, type, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method='Landfill' AND pickup_schedule='Weekly';
SELECT id, location, type, disposal_method, pickup_schedule FROM waste_disposal WHERE type LIKE 'Industrial%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_initiatives WHERE recycling_method='Composting' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT id, location FROM recycling_center WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_statistics WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE location = 'City A' AND collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM waste_statistics WHERE recycling_center_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT location, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE location = 'California' AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;

SELECT w.location, r.accepts_materials FROM waste_collection w JOIN recycling_center r ON w.location = r.location WHERE w.collection_date < '2022-09-30' AND r.accepts_materials LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY w.collection_date DESC;
SELECT ws.waste_type, SUM(ws.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM waste_statistics ws GROUP BY ws.waste_type HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT wc.location, rc.location AS recycling_location, ws.quantity FROM waste_collection wc JOIN recycling_center rc ON wc.id = ws.collection_id AND rc.id = ws.recycling_center_id JOIN waste_statistics ws ON ws.collection_id = wc.id AND ws.recycling_center_id = rc.id WHERE ws.quantity >= 500 ORDER BY ws.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_bins;
SELECT id, location FROM recycling_centers WHERE accepted_materials='plastic';
SELECT location, capacity FROM waste_bins ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT bin_id, disposal_date, disposed_materials FROM disposal_records WHERE disposed_materials='glass' AND disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_id, year, materials_recycled FROM recycling_statistics WHERE year=2021;
SELECT * FROM waste_bins ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, capacity FROM waste_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM disposal_records GROUP BY location HAVING total_disposals > 5 ORDER BY total_disposals DESC;
SELECT r.location, rs.materials_recycled FROM recycling_centers r INNER JOIN recycling_statistics rs ON r.id = rs.center_id WHERE rs.materials_recycled > 5000 ORDER BY rs.materials_recycled DESC;
SELECT r.location, COUNT(d.id) AS total_disposals FROM recycling_centers r LEFT JOIN disposal_records d ON r.id = d.bin_id GROUP BY r.location ORDER BY total_disposals DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_centers;
SELECT name, location FROM waste_collection_centers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, capacity FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_pickup_schedule WHERE pick_up_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_id, collection_date, collected_weight FROM waste_collection_records WHERE center_id = 3 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_centers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT center_id, collection_date, collected_weight FROM waste_collection_records WHERE collected_weight BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT r.date, r.material_type, r.recycled_amount, w.name FROM recycling_statistics r JOIN waste_collection_centers w ON r.date = w.id;

SELECT wcc.name AS center_name, wcc.capacity AS center_capacity, ws.pick_up_date, ws.pick_up_route FROM waste_collection_centers wcc JOIN waste_pickup_schedule ws ON wcc.id = ws.center_id ORDER BY ws.pick_up_date DESC;
